name: mikroe.click.ecg5
short_description: ECG 5 Click can be used for the development of ECG and Heart-Rate (HR) applications. The Click boardâ„¢ features the AD8232, an integrated bio-signal front end. This IC has many features necessary for providing accurate ECG measurements, including very high common-mode rejection ratio, high gain with DC blocking capability, adjustable high-pass and low-pass filters, integrated right leg drive (RLD), etc.
